name: J. D. Sands v. John D. McKee et al., Dwelling House Insurance Company, Garnishee, Appellants

judges: Before Stebbett, C. J., Gbeen, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: J. D. Sands v. John D. McKee et al., Dwelling House Insurance Company, Garnishee, Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice McCollum,
For the reasons given in the opinion filed in No. 89, October term, 1896, Yost v. Insurance Co., ante, p. 381, the judgment in this case is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice McCollum,

casebody.head_matter:
J. D. Sands v. John D. McKee et al., Dwelling House Insurance Company, Garnishee, Appellants.
January 4, 1897 :
Argued Oct.’ 30, 1896.
Appeal, No. 90, Oct. T., 1896, by defendants, from judgment of C. P. No. 3, Allegheny Co., Nov. T., 1894, No. 628, on verdict for plaintiffs.
Before Stebbett, C. J., Gbeen, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
